content.detailedDescription: I was outside in my backyard taking photos of the sky. right next to the sun was a huge contrail left by a plane also flying overhead. i shot directly into the sun and did not see the object until i uploaded it to my computer.
content.summary: Ufo not seen with the naked eye only when uploaded to my computer

content.detailedDescription:
It was early morning between 5:30 and 6:30 am.  i was on my way to work about four blocks from my house.  as i rounded a curve in the road going down to main street, i saw a strange object hovering above the animas river maybe 50 feet above just by the race track arena.  i slowed the car down to watch the craft as i was facing the craft directly east in front of me.  i just stared at it and noticed a being through the front window in sillouett staring straight ahead down the river or maybe looking at controls.  i had been reading about ufo's since 1969 and knew what i was looking at.  the being inside was not human.  at the time i did not know it was a grey.  i just realized that recently.  i can draw the shape of the craft but it doesn't fit any typical shape that i can explain.  i can say it fit the description of a one man scout vessel.  it was still dark in town and the being had a little light showing *his/her outline.  he had a big head and scrawny neck, skinny body as seen from the side, could not see arms.  as i kept driving very slowly down to main street, the craft then began to move forward very slowly down the river south into the town proper then down south of town, out of town to the open valley.  then it picked up speed, gradually ascending and burst out of sight somewhere near the new mexico border.  i was in awe at what i was looking at.  i knew what it was but couldn't believe it.
i can sketch the craft but don't have the capability to post it here.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Spotted small craft over the animas river in town hovering, then followed river out of town

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in my grandmothers front yard with around 5 or 6 other people and i'm not sure who said something first but the next thing i knew we were all looking at this object. i would say it was traveling maybe 10 mph and was less then a 100 yards above us. if i wanted to i could have hit the object with a rock no problem. the object made no sound at all and we watched it travel towards a lake that we fish at about 4 miles away. as the object traveled out of sight my self a cousin and my ankle who was also my best friend at the time all got in his s10 pickup truck and started to drive towards the lake where we thought it was heading after arriving a few miles up the road we can see the object again and as we slow down to get a better look at this thing my ankle turns the truck on to a small side road and as we turned on the road theobject was almost straight above us and just then the truck died everything just stopped working and as the object slowly started to cross over the lake the truck started right back up at which time we all 3 thought it was a good time to get the hell out of there. also at the same time as we were turning on the side road there were other cars pulled over and at least one woman was taking pictures of the object. i remember after the truck died i got out of the truck and asked the woman taking the pictures what the object was and she refused to answer me and just kept taking pictures of this craft. the funny thing was when we returned home and was asked about what happened by the other family members that had seen the same object just minutes earlier we told them what happened with the truck and about the woman taking pictures of this craft and not more then three minutes later that was the end of it. i don't think i told this story to more then 2 people over the last 27 years
content.summary: Can not explain in 25words not even close

content.detailedDescription:
Leaving the winery on tarlton road and we were about ready to get into the car. 

we were looking at how beatiful the moon was and saw the object in the sky. 

we thought it was a ballon but then i continued to get bigger and change shape as it was moving by. 

the object was very dark in color black from where we were standing. we first saw it in the western sky and it moved toward the eastern sky in a floating motion. there were light green and blue light shining up in the sky. very light in color. 

we were just in shook and wanted to know what it was. it wasn't light enough to see it clear enough. 

it went over the tree line and out of sight.
content.summary: The object was black on color changed shape almost like a blob in the sky. there were greenish and light blue light casting upon the sky into the light cloud cover. it seemed to be floating moving slowly overhead without move abruptly.

content.detailedDescription: I was at home watching tv on a mid july night in 2008.  my girlfriend sarah (now my wife) went to take our black lab smokey out front to go to the bathroom.  the dog started barking and it seemed like sarah was back in the house within a matter of seconds.  sarah yelled for me to come here you need to see this.  i got off the couch and as i approached sarah she was pale looking.  i asked her what was wrong and she could barely speak.  sarah pointed out the door and said there is something across the road.  sarah told me she wasn't going back out there.  i laughed at her and went outside, she yelled at me to get back in the house.  i totally ignored her and just kept staring at the ufo.  the ufo was a triangular shape that was all black with 3 red lights underneath it, one red light in each corner of the triangular craft.  it made no noise and just hovered barely over the trees on the edge of the field across the road from our house. i was mesmerized and stood there staring at the ufo for at least 15 minutes.  sarah kept begging me to come back in the house the whole time i was outside observing the ufo.  she was so terrified she wouldn't even cross the threshold of the door as she was begging me to come back in the house. the ufo was still there when i finally came back in the house.  i didn't want to come back in but i did to calm sarah down.  before i went to bed i looked back outside the window and it was gone.  to this day sarah doesn't like me talking about what happened because i think it scares her.
content.summary: Seen triangular craft hovering just above the trees across the road from our house

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was at my house on  the balcony, looking at the night sky.
2. what made me see the objects was them appearing in the night sky very suddenly out of nowhere. the red lights attracted my attention, as they were very bright. 
3. when i first saw the 3 red lights, i thought that they were simply airplane wing lights, but as i was watching the lights they weren't moving, they wee stationary. then after hovering for 25 minutes, they descended very rapidly towards vitosha mountain and seemed to have landed, as they  disappeared. 10-15 minutes after it's descent, i saw it ascending from somewhere near the mountain. it made a few manoeuvrings up and to both sides, then it shot up at the night sky at incredible speeds. then the objects were never seen again.
content.summary: 2 bright red lights and one dim red light next to each other

content.detailedDescription:
The following report copied from nuforc.Org where i originally submitted. i was looking for my report in your database and realized i never submitted it to mufon. wanted the report to be in both databases so that anyone who has a similar sighting can cross-reference. 


occurred : 3/6/2013 19:15 (entered as : 03/06/2013 19:15)
reported: 3/6/2013 8:26:54 pm 20:26
posted: 5/15/2013
location: katy, tx
shape: diamond
duration:20-30 minutes
saw 10 noiseless ufo's that changed from an orange ball to a white ball to a diamond shaped craft traveling in a straight line.

i was outside just after dark with my kids and noticed a strange round white light in the distance toward the small airport near my house(it would also be the direction toward nasa's johnson space center but i have no idea how far they had traveled or if they were visible before i saw them). the area where we live is just off fm 1093 heading west out of katy, and although it is growing fast, it is still dark enough to see quite a few stars and some planets most nights.

at first, i thought it was venus but after a couple of minutes watching it, i realized it was much too large and bright. around this time i first noticed it slowly moving. the first thing i noticed was that it was moving way too slowly to be an airplane and it also seemed much lower than the planes we normally see. living next to an small local airport for the last six years, small planes above our house are quite commonplace as well as commercial jetliners out of houston-hobby.

after it had moved closer, another orange light appeared some distance behind the first. as it came closer the bright white light on the first went out but was replaced by flashing colored lights on the left, rear, and right points of what at first i thought was a backwards triangle. around this same time the 2nd orange light turned into a white light exactly like the first.

so now there is a black triangle/diamond(?) shaped craft, making no noise, tracking slowly across the sky heading nw. at about the time the 1st passed over my neighborhood, the bright light on 2nd changed exactly as the 1st had changed. there was also another hovering white light by this time in the original location and another seperate orange (4 craft total at this point). all were tracking the same straight path and were maybe 1/4 - 1/2 mile apart in the sky. all went through the same sequence of ball-of-light to noiseless-black-triangle. all moved much slower than a normal large jet out of hobby and they seemed to be much larger and lower to the ground than one of hobby's jets as well.

my 6 yr old son saw them and said that they were ufo's. i told him they were probably military and i think i probably still believed this at the time. around this time i noticed that my neighbor across the street was on his porch talking to another neighbor. i knew my wife would never believe me and i didn't think my cell phone would take very convincing pictures so the kids and i went across the street. there were several kids in their front yard that my son knew, so while he and his sister played with them, i asked them if they had seen the crazy lights.

they said no and i realized that they couldn't see the bright white lights from their yard for my house. just as i was about to say the heck with it, one of the diamond/triangles came over exactly as the ones my son and i had seen. i pointed at it and my neighbor immediately said, "that's no plane, it's shaped like a diamond.' the angle from his yard or the lighting must have been different a little bit different because now i could clearly see that it did have four corners although the front corner did not have the same flashing lights as the other three corners. now i could also see a bulge in the center of the craft on the bottom and maybe the top had a bulge as well (thought i couldn't be sure).

all three of us saw the exact same thing as another three craft went over. all three of us were basically the same demographically: in our forties with kids about the same ages. two or three of the older kids also saw it. one of my neighbors was convinced it was one of the drones that have been in the news lately. i think they were far to big to be drones.

we went home and i got the kids in bed. my wife's brother called and i walked out into the backyard to talk to him. at this time 3 more came along the same straight line(for a total of 10) exhibiting almost the same behavior as the first 7 with one exception. numbers 8 and 9, as they passed over my house, seemed to either speed up very rapidly just as they passed over my roof or perhaps they went dark. whatever the reason, i could not track them on the other side of my house as i had been able to with all the others.

the last one was the slowest and lowest of them all. since 8 and 9 had disappeared, i ran into the front yard just as 10 was flying over and i watched it for several minutes until it was just a dot on the nw horizon.

i have never seen anything like this before, although i have read several books and watched quite a few tv shows on the ufo phenomenon. i probably would have never posted this though, if it weren't for the fact that on feb 4 of this year, here in katy, someone else reported seeing 10 noiseless balls of light tracking in a straight line. maybe someone out there knows something about these sightings or another similiar one and will post something else.

a couple more random observations: one of the objects might have had a low noise (nothing like a jet) and another of the objects while it was still a ball appeared to emit some sort of lighted hazy fog (electrical discharge?) right before it changed to the diamond-shape.
content.summary: Saw 10 noiseless ufo's that changed from an orange ball to a white ball to a diamond shaped craft traveling in a straight line.

content.detailedDescription: While waiting for a traffic light to change i noticed a strange looking hole which appeared in the clouds. i took a picture of the hole with my camera phone. i moved forward one car length nearer the traffic light as cars went through the intersection. i snapped another picture of the hole in the cloud as it grew bigger and changed shape slightly. i noticed a second hole to the right of the first hole. that is when i noticed a blue colored orb as it passed the edge of the hole.  i moved forward one more car length and snapped a couple more pictures of the holes and the orb. it moved downward from the holes and to the right of the second one. the last picture i took showed the orb in the tree line.
content.summary: Cloud holes and blue orb

content.detailedDescription: When i tried out camcorder, later watching video, i got an object that seemed to pop out of cloud. about center and close to top a white orb object very fast shoots across sky. i know it was not an insect but you decide. thanks.
content.summary: Supersonic insect or white orb ufo, you decide, watch video.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
2015jun20 at 11:20pm ufo sighting.
there were 15-18 lights that were orangish-yellow on top and bottom, red in the center flying in formation. they were flying rather low (from my vantage point, maybe 20degrees up from horizon) in groups of three in a straight line, from west to east in the northern sky. they seemed to pulse & made no sound, and were traveling at approximately 30mph. when they disappeared behind the trees, i got in my car and drove north about a 1/2 mile to a clearing (appox. 2minutes) where i had clear view for 10miles to the east (the direction which they were headed) and they were just gone.

note: as straight as their flight formation was, they may have been one long craft...
content.summary: 15-18 lights orangish-yellow top & bottom, red center flying in formation

content.detailedDescription: Been a true believer.. based on faith alone i split from my group, i opened my mind with extacy and symbolically laid myself down in front of the stones trying to concentrate waves of emotion through myself, through the crowd and through the stones focused upward. u could say i called them. lookin back it feels i almost had to complete a ritual for the revelation, i had the faith, i recognised a picture of a certain constellation on my friends wall, brought it up.. spoke it aloud, then i made the pilgrimage, been in a happy place of course u r friendly and concerned with fellow pilgrims n inevitably do ur few lil good deeds on the way, speaking with ppl who had lost their group, giving things u had brought to aid ur friends.. and then the laying down and opening my mind accumulated to what i can only describe as a genuine interaction and  personal sighting because i had a sudden urge to photograph the stones, now it was 1.20am the morning of the solstice in one of the most ancient and holy sites in britain, i took out my phone and started snapping, at first standing up with no flash and eventually laying on my belly arms outstretched, however it was soon clear the spotlights installed for the event lighting the stones was absorbing my camera flash and in fact my desired picture would not be possible but i didn't stop. it was if i was being made to do this. nothing was visible to the naked eye, thousands of people seemingly unaware, i wasn't aware myself as i awoke invigorated with a strange feeling something weird had just happened, i took the last photo, ironically perfect as time had lapsed it was getting light and the spotlights were out.. i then checked my photos. i now know what happened, i don't know if they removed me briefly physically or just connected with my mind but i know i called them, they spoke to me and let me  capture the moment on film. please note.. the chosen mind altering and emotion enhancing drug would have prevented me from falling asleep naturally and i have no sign of physical contact... to say i wasn't hit unconscious. . circumstances backed with my reel of pics i can send leave no doubt in my mind. pps. moon was a new moon, crescent that night.
content.summary: I made the pilgrimage for solstice laid down infront of the stones and gave myself up in mind and body. was influenced to take photos.. captured craft invisible to naked eye and was rendered unconscious.

content.detailedDescription:
I have seen many objects/u.F.O's over the years. but this is the best of the lot...Baring one more..
2 weeks before the sighting on a thursday i was in the back garden with my dog's i ahve always been one for u.F.O's so never miss out on keeping my eye open..
i heards a jet like sound but was not close by, as i looked to the sky's i saw from the north east 2 red object's just fell out the clouds, was a pretty clear day with with the odd cloud here and there..Was a vertical drop maybe about 2 miles angle approx 45 degree's from the earth they both stopped just for approx 1 second then started going eastwards at a slow pace aprrox 50/60mph.
2 week's later both me and my wife was watching a program on a thursday night the music to the program had just started when a massive roar when over our house the walls and floor trembled, it was like a jet going over very low, but to low. i knew straight away the sound, i told my wife quick my camera was handy grabed it to go to the front of the house, as i opened the frond door i was astonished to see 4 red pod's like craft going over the noise was awesome, then the crafts was starting to turn right you coul only see a cigar shaped objects possible 10ft long no exaust fume's and nothing at the rear, over the road there are house's not to far from where we was standing approx 50 yards i knew i had not much time so took a quick shot my camera as the object's started to dissapear was not set on flash mode it was dark evening sky..Both i and my wife went inside our house my wife was asking had i any idea to what the object's i could only tell her as to what we saw and must have been alien pod's  her no idea but to see what we had on the camera..I put sd card into laptop to reveal 2 red pod's like object's one to the left another one to the righti turn to my wife in excitment and said yes got them..On looking at the photo there is a type of propeller at the rear also red exhaust fume's coming from the propeller..As i have stated this is not the only object i have witnessed to many to write about here..I have only cropped the photo..No photo shopping has been made..To this day my wife and i still talk about it..Also reported to ken pfiefer at that time..
content.summary: Red can only see the true detail of object on photo

content.detailedDescription: Light grey circular shape with multiple blinking lights in succession red, green & white - tube like "exhaust" tanks in multiples of three lined up horizontally around the four points of the circular shape - slowly ascended away and at the rate of a helicopter...Airplanes and helicopters will only have a couple of blinking lights below, above and on the wings of the craft...This ufo had a succession of three-four lights blinking in sequence red, green & then white...The craft seemed to be the back end of a craft (circular) but was extremely large...I watched for approximately 15-20 minutes as it slowly ascended...From what looked like tree top level ever slowly higher and higher...I tried to figure out or identify what i was seeing, but i have never seen any type of craft such as that...
content.summary: Circular shape with multiple blinking lights in succession - tube like "exhaust" tanks in multiples of three

content.detailedDescription: Didn't know what she caught in the pics til uploaded to pc weeks later don't know what direction it was going. i myself have seen this object several times before both noon and night just couldn't take pics . night time sighting it appeared star like and slowly moving emitting bright flashes of light one solid color not changing colors at all (white flashes)of light almost like looking for something/someone.Unknown direction of flight but captured a private plane prior to taking pic in question!That appears to be north of the address taken! i was not present when wife took these pics
content.summary: Wife took these pics of clouds on this day

content.detailedDescription: It was between 3 and 4 am i went outside my camper trailer to use the tree to go to the bathroom. due to where i was and skunks i carry a flashlight and scanned the grass and then scanned the trees so i wasnt sprayed...When the flashlight hit the tree line i could see a dark hump like something kneeling down and wouldnt have thought much of it but heard like wetness and twigs breaking so i made a noise by stompin my foot on the steps when i did this thing jhst a little shorter than me stood up quick and ran into the brush behind a tree. i could at that point see clearly the glow i recieved back from the light shining its eyes it was an awkward yellow glow bright like a glow stick. it was holding the tree and peeri g from behind it looking curiously at me up and down side to side so i threw my gatorade which was a full bottle and made noise close to it and it wasnt bothered. i went back in the camper told my girlfriend what happened and that it was extremely frightening i was pale in complexion from the expeirence and did not go out again that night....Two nights following it happened again twenty feet closer to lake huron but wasnt concealed by the woods and it saw me looking at it and i was fixing to grav something incase it did anything to.Threaten me at which time he ran like a human runs but much faster toward the water. i heard what sounded like something running in knee high water in an eastward direction and was again so scared i actually left that spot for the rest of the night. it frieghtened me to where i tryely do not want to be outside over by the treeline or at all really around the place unless carrying a weapon for protection. it was the most ive ever been afraid in the wilderness at night in my life. i saw the twigs and vegitation matted down where it was running thru. i am intending on using a bear trap or two over in that area and am going to mount trail cams to see i i can get any evidence other than a footpath and my own word so people know whats really out there in our home planet.
content.summary: Encountered an alien being

content.detailedDescription:
ufo report 


may 30, 2015 


 


 


 


on saturday, may 30, 2015 at approximately 8:00 pm, over the green valley area of henderson, nv, my wife and i got in the car to go out and eat like we do every saturday night.  we got in the car and turned around the corner just a 100 ft from our home and a bright light caught the corner of eye and i looked up and couldn't believe what i was seeing.  there was a huge triangular shaped black ship with seven large bright lights on the two sides of the v shaped front.  i could see the ship up close as i am sure it was below 1000 ft elevation and still daylight. it had been a rainy and overcast day in the las vegas area and it appeared that the ship had just popped out of a low cloud bank.   my wife couldn't see it as she was sitting on the other side of the car so i stopped and asked her to get out and look up, but just as she started get out it disappeared.  it was like someone turned a switch and it disappeared before my eyes.  i had a clear visual look at the ship for about 45 seconds.  the ship was large with a 300 to 500 ft long triangular sides looked like a flat black wing which seemed very super sonic.  the unusual thing was the lights, they were not mounted on the superstructure.  there was a rigging made with black pipes attached to the fuselage that held the lights and protruded out from the ship about 10 feet.  i questioned how they could fly through the atmosphere at high speed with lights like that.  there were seven lights, one right on the point and 3 each down each side.  they were large,  rectangular, the longest length vertical.  they were 3 or 4 ft high and 2 or 3 ft wide.  the ship was moving very slow, less than 30 miles an hour and there was no noise of visible engines or intakes. 


  i am very familiar with the b2 bomber as a saw it fly over very low over us at at the rose parade several years ago.  i also had the opportunity to stand under it at nellis afb during air force air show a few years ago.  the  ship i saw was bigger than the b2, possibly two or three times the size.  i is scary to even think about this huge thing was hovering only about five or six hundred above the roof tops of the homes in the las vegas area.
content.summary: I saw huge triangleur shaped back ship over the roof tops of my neighbors at about 500 ft elevation for about 45 seconds and the it disappeared before my eyes.

content.detailedDescription:
I believe i was 4 years old. 1949. we lived in the woodside highlands. i slept on the back porch. my parents and i had been out to visit friends that night. when we arrived home i remember that my parents said that it was very late. we all went to bed. i was laying in bed on the back porch which looked out to the trees. that were on the other side of the creek that was right behind the house. all of a sudden i saw what i thought was the sun come up. there was a blink and this white globe instantly appeared like when a light is turned on. it blinked again and it was instantly closer and lighter. then it blinked again and it was very close, very large and very bright. like turning on a three way light like the lamp that we had in our living room. 
i thought this is too bright, and it immediately blinked back to the second position which was a less bright and slightly farther back. i thought to myself, now that is better. 
i then instantly felt very tired, and i was thinking that it was because the sun had come up. in hind sight i guess the feeling was like  being drugged.
i told my mother the next day and she said that it must have been the moon because we didn't get home that late.  later when i was a little older she told me she thought that i had seen a ufo.
i am now 69 years old and remember that instance like it was yesterday. of course i have known for a long time that it was indeed a ufo. 
i had weird dreams for a long time after that, that had to do with seeing things that were in the near future. as  i grew older i have experienced other "gifts" and more recently wondered if i was abducted or visited and if this is why these gifts developed. these include seeing glimpses of the near future without dreaming. seeing auras at times. various forms of telepathy. i was good at math in school, but did it my own way in my head and  was often accused of cheating. i have also seen other things that i cannot explain. i have had to keep all of these things to my self because of my profession. i work as a 
director of a treatment program and have been working as a therapist for many years. i have never been able to talk about how i know some things about my clients other than explain my insights in clinically excepted terms to my colleagues. i am reputable in my field of substance abuse and mental health treatment. i earned  my doctorate at the age of 53. i need  to keep this anonymous because of my career. i would really like to know if there were any other sightings in woodside, california in 1949 or early 1950.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: I thought it was the sun coming up. but it came up like a 3 way light bulb near to far to medium. we had gotten home late. but i was told the next day that it was not that late. i slept on the porch in the hills of woodside.

content.detailedDescription: I was a truck driver (now disabled). i hauled propane out of the twin cities two points in minnesota and wisconsin. i had just started jumping off a load in new richmond wisconsin win i saw a reflection of the object in my glasses. so i looked up and saw the object approaching from the west traveling eastbound. it was large and chevron shaped with lights on the bottom but the interesting thing is that it was translucent or maybe cloaked. i could see the outline and i could see the lights but they weren't very bright.After it passed directly overhead and not much further it disappeared, but not because it was too far away but maybe the cloaking device obscured it.This happened in early january of the year 2000. i had no idea at the time how to report a sighting so i never went any further with it. being a private pilot and an aircraft enthusiast, i knew immediately that this was not an airplane. or at least one that the public knows about.
content.summary: Saw reflection of object in my glasses so looked up, was somewhat cloaked but i saw outline and faint lights.

content.detailedDescription:
This experience could very well be a dream.. i don't know, honestly. but it was very real to me, and i would like to know if anybody else has had a similar experience. i think this will sound kind of far fetched.. no one  has believed me, and they have all laughed at me..

i used to have this mental exercise i would do to help me fall asleep.. it would be considered a lot like astral projection, you know.. where you can leave your body and be aware of your surroundings.. to a very great detail.. i started by meditating, becoming intimately aware of my immediate surroundings.. i started with my bedroom, then eventually i could roam the hallways.. see my kids as they slept. i practiced this for a couple of years.. every night i would get a little bit farther away from myself. i used to "float" above my town, seeing all the traffic. i would slowly rise and get farther and farther away. i could slowly leave our solar system.. leave the galaxy.. see our local galactic group.. i got very good at it.

one night, i was shortly into my meditation, just rising out of the atmosphere of our planet, and i found myself getting pulled into a tunnel.. there were a ring of lights at the start of the tunnel. i found myself getting pulled onto a metallic table, our bed.. there were 5 figures around me, 4 of them shorter, and 1 taller one. they were all greyish in nature with big eyes, small mouth.. i couldn't see a nose or a mouth. i was very, very scared. i was fighting very hard, and they started restraining me to the table. i kept kicking and screaming, and swinging my arms as hard as i possible could. and then, i heard a voice in my head.. the loudest and clearest thing i have ever heard.. either in my head or with my ears, and it simply boomed, "sleep!" and instantly, i stopped fighting, i became relaxed.. and i found myself back in my bedroom, next to my wife, the clock said 3:43.. i was out of breathe, i couldn't get back to sleep. i was very agitated.. after a couple of hours i eventually did get back to sleep, and the next day, my entire body was sore.. everything hurt.. after this encounter, my entire life changed for the worse. i cant sleep anymore, i am always depressed.. my mind doesn't seem to work the same anymore. i cant do my mental exercise.. lack of concentration or simply fear of what may happen.. i don't know.

i have never been so scared of anything in my life.. and i don't even know if it was real.. or if i just happened to slip into a dream while i was projecting myself, and was still conscious on some level experiencing body "paralysis" that happens when you reach rem sleep.. i don't know, but if there are other instances of a similar occurrence, maybe that will help ease my mind a bit. it turns out that in my town there were several ufo sightings close to the time of my experience..

please give me some information.. anything
i would be willing to under go a lie detector or hypnosis, or anything you could think of to validate my experience and get/give information
content.summary: Phsycic abduction?

content.detailedDescription:
I have pics. i think most are nothing but i got a immediate reaction from hafb and was watched by a helicopter for a few. i think the mother ship is right above me as i'm type. the stars in this triangle formation look distorted. looks like tip running light same size as before but a lot higher in sky and does not move. no engine lights. i took many pics. i have no idea why the stars came out red in the pic when their white. only pic that is label is the helicopter that rushed in roaring then stop few miles away seconds after i started taking pics. i've seen this drone many times before. i know for a fact it was not lifeline hospital helie to las cruces or elpaso. i dont think i got anything good on the files but you can try to see if you can pull something out of the image. i think the drone reacted to my camera flash. i can prove bases to this theory to you very easily. also note this is my second case i'm submitting. if you need me to give you the number i can. only contact me if there is something big in the bulk pics. 

i went back outside to observe some more at 1:30a.M. still no movement. drone long gone now. but i'm notice something else. like i said stars dont look normal tonight. most times i see orion's belt in this area. instead i see the same triangle pattern taken place in 5 location at different altitude. 

yes there is a lot of dust in the air noticeable on the mountains and we do have clouds in the area. i'm trying to rationalise that everything is normal but none of it is adding up that way to me. i think there are 5 mother ships park right above our county. and all stars are distorted in the triangle "running lights". no engine light. but heavy blinking in random spots. by the naked eye i dont know if my eyes are playing tricks on me if i see outline silhouettes.

i believe my camera time is off from my computer so you know. unless i really just lost 20min. photo labeled helicopter i think is the one. i know there is a photo were i turned flash off and pecan trees should show up on the bottom in the last 3 shoots. all other photos are only sky. i played with the zoom button to see if i could see anything. the helicopter came out looking like a galaxy on my computer.

there are two more photos. i made sure the group of photos were the helie should be in were added. like i said if you find something that you need to get me on the phone about pull up my first case file. other wise i'm sure i was only messing with hafb with my camera flash and they sent their huver drone.

end time 2:18a.M.
content.summary: I had this weird feeling inside me to look up now so looked up and the stars are not normal

content.detailedDescription: I was at my mothers house in elyria ohio walking down the stairs after washing the hair dye out of my hair and this orange flashing light caught my attention. i called my mom to the upstairs window and said "mom this isn't a plane, its too big and its bright bright orange and it looked bigger than a plane flying over the house". the bright orangish red flashing light cause my attention. she had saw one when she was younger and she said it looked similar. as i was looking at it, it disappeared out of no where. we went outside and it was then in the backyard over the tree line. it disappeared a second time and came back down the road further which is when i finally realized hey i should video this thing. wish i would have sooner especially when it was sooo much closer. it would move then stop and hover and then move and disappear. i was in such aw that i couldn't believe it and didn't even think to take my phone out to video the best and closet part of it. i ended up going inside after a while because i was getting eaten alive my the bugs outside. however i called my boyfriend and cousin and they ended up seeing three ufo's in a triangular shape down the street from where i was.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: An oval or disc shaped with bright red/orange lights

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and her mother spotted an object flying over the house and called me while i was at home hanging out with her cousin. we went out looking for it. as we gave up and was driving home on east river rd. i spotted 3 lights in a triangular like formation. they appeared to be stationary or moving very slowly at most. i immediately pulled over and took pictures before they vanished about 15 seconds later. we were excited but i was skeptical when i first saw it i figured it may have been flying lanterns but after watching my girlfriends video and talking with her and her mother made me think otherwise.
content.summary: I seen 3 lights in a triangular formation.

content.detailedDescription:
July 1999. i was driving home from work from crown cleaners. i ran the second shop in deltona.  my son  was 5. i remember thinking that i wanted to get home to him. i came down main street. turned left then right on garfield. that's when it happened. i saw it. overhead to the left. in the direction of the saint johns river.... and left to our house. a circular shape with lights. i thought i was seeing things, but i know it was circular because the lights were in a circular shape. i then thought... that's not an airplane. i pulled over and watched it. it was high in the sky but i saw it. it hovered there for maybe 10 mins or so, then it was gone. it went up and was gone. i've never seen anything like it. then i noticed off to the right.. which seemed like a smaller one but then i realized it was further up.... farther away... also then shot up..... and was gone. i was born in 1974


my father told me of a story when he was a teenager ( it was after his father died.. so hes was about 15 or so. he was born in 1946) a ufo crashed in the woods next to his house by the lake. military showed up, roped and blocked everything off.They told them to go home and stay away.  but before that.... he and his brother saw a disk crash in the woods.  a few days after the military had left... my dad said that there was a huge spot on the ground... where nothing grew and it seemed almost burned. nothing ever grew there again. this was in winter park, fl.  he and his brother were not allowed to talk about this incident. their mother ( my grandmother) was widowed. i guess she didn't need any more problems.

i have to be honest. i hope that it will not happen, though, i am concerned my boys may have experiences .... and not tell me.  just as my father and i have never told anyone but each other.
content.summary: Dark and light grey with blueish white lights in a cirlular shape

content.detailedDescription:
(copied from my previous to nuforc)

last night, june 8th, 2015, around 9:35pm, my husband and i were dropping off my daughter and nephew to my cousins house in the groves at legacy park off of hwy 27. while we were driving through the neighborhood, we both saw bright gold-orange lights above and behind some of the houses. we didnt have a clear view, as we were glancing these lights between houses as we passed them.

at first, i had thought only i saw them. as my husband saw me craning my neck to catch peeks between the houses, he said, it is streetlights, babe. then i knew that he has seen the same lights i had. so i took his word for it and we dropped off the kids. the kids had not noticed anything as they were in the back talking and distracted by teen things.

as we pulled up towards the stoplight on hwy 27, we saw the lights in the sky again! only now, they were off in the distance across the highway on the east side of hwy 27. what we saw in the sky were what appeared to be 2 enormous triangle shaped objects that consisted of 3 large and extremely bright gold-orange lights each. **this could also have been 6 bright lights in two separate v formations??** but to us, it appeared to be 2 large triangles with 3 lights a piece. 

as we were watching the lights and freaking out, i was telling my husband that i knew i had seen something when we were dropping the kids off! the lights moved farther away together for a few moments, then suddenly, right before our eyes, one of the triangles (3 lights) just disappeared!! 

we had pulled onto hwy 27 going south and keeping our eyes on the last triangle. we were speeding down the highway trying to reach a particular side road that we could pull off on and try to record on my husbands phone.** as we were driving, i was trying to record and did a horrible job of it. i was so excited/nervous that i never actually hit record, so i got nothing! ** the triangle of lights continued moving very swiftly to the southeast. suddenly, as we watched, this triangle just disappeared, same as the first!! it disappeared in the vicinity of the omni resorts golf course.

right as it disappeared, we reached the side road and pulled off near the new four corners high school. we rolled down the windows of the car and searched the sky to see if it would reappear or if there were any other traces of it. my husband said that if it were any commercial aircraft it would have navigation lights (blinking red, green, blue, or white type lights) like you see on airplanes and helicopters. there was no sign of the triangle. it simply vanished.

i am not sure what this was. this is not the first ufo weve seen either. we are the family that saw a domed-disk ufo on sept. 24, 2011. we are still coming to terms with what we saw that night. then to see this last night is mind boggling. i am wondering why many other people who were on the road have not reported seeing this?! it was very obvious.
content.summary: 2 triangles of lights over davenport fl

content.detailedDescription: The three lighted objects looked like giant satellites and we're stationary in a vertical triangle next to the moon. they were unmoving and just hung in the sky
content.summary: Three bright stationary lights that were in a perfect triangle weat in the sky by the moon they were present for hours still there

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend at the time and i were taking a night drive up mt. baldy road, to get away for alil while,it was a clear beautiful night, we pulled off the side of the road next to a gulch,he had his arms around me whe he noticed them, he asked me to turn around and tell me what i see, what i saw were huge silver translucent,transforming,suspended in air 12 of them completely silent transforming into shapes of soft triangles and soft rounded edges,they were almost flowing so gracefuly that they almost seemed alive it was'nt something made of metal and bolts. it was surreal and beautiful at the same time. there were 2 crafts present one on either side of the gulch, it was as if the were security of sorts, watchdogs, guarding, i could see thru these objects as they seemed to dance gracefuly in mid air, transparent and looked like liquid mercury but translucent,and allumentaeing brightly,silently. we must of been there for a good long while awe struck and amazed,something stepped on a twig or something that actually snapped both of us out of that daze were both in,and that was enough for us! we both turned around to run back to the van he was driving to get the hell away from there, now it really gets strange, and i swear its all true! when we turned around, over our heads were so many crafts of all sizes! from very very, small, to the very large, some with lots of colorful lights and those with none.Freaked out we jumped in the van and he drove like a bat out of hell,i thought we crash, but the crafts that were over us were chasing us, keeping pace and it was not cool at all! there was one that kept up with us right along side of the driverside window, it was a orange ball the size of a large basketball. as soon as we hit the city limits, they all in aflash zipped up and were gone! all except for that ornage one it decided to torment us just a lil bit longer, and bam! it zipped up into the night sky and it was gone!
content.summary: Huge silver translucent,transforming,suspended in air 12 of them completely silent changing  their shapes into soft triangles rounded edges see thru them suspended fluent beautiful like liquid mercury suspended in mid air 2 other craft

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving down meetinghouse road to my fiances house when i looked over towards susquehanna rd and saw this large orange ball floating down the road. i could only see the upper half of the ball due to the trees in the way.

i turned around and started head to susquehanna rd to try and catch it ( i had a 427 chevy 4 speed and was really flying to catch it) however by the time i meet the rd it was on it was gone. i lost site of it while chasing it due to the trees.

when i was on meetinghouse road i watched it move down the road, cross an intersection and go about another quarter of a mile before i started out after it.

i knew it had to be a ufo, it couldn't possibly anything else. i couldn't wait to tell my fianc about it. i just wish i would have caught up to it. i did over a 100 mph to try to catch it, so much so i became airborne a few times.

i will never forget that day.

i've seen what i believe i saw on your mufon show on tv (hanger 1: the ufo files) more than once but in a different location.
content.summary: Round orange ball floating down susquehanna rd.

content.detailedDescription: Coming home from work at 12:15 midnight i thought i saw a small plane that was too close and might crash.  i pulled over and put my car in park and the lights dimmed enough for me to see it was no plane and there was no sound.  it was a ufo.  people were talking a lot about this in the 60's and i thought for sure i was going to be 'beamed up'. i saw little windows on the top part around the whole disk but nothing in there.  i put my head on the steering wheel to cry because i would not see my baby again.  all street lights and my car engine was shut off and that made the ufo seem more pronounced.  as i waited for the 'beam' time passed --i don't know how much.   then all the lights and my car came back on and i turned my head to look out the window very thankful i was still in the car, and they just looked at me for what seemed like 5 minutes, then they just disappeared right before my eyes.  they did not lift up or move, just disappeared.  i was 2 or 3 blocks from home where we lived with my parents and i hurried on home to tell my mom what i saw.  i was very excited and told it over and over.  years later i would remember she too was upset and excited and had rambled on about how late i was and how worried she had been.  unfortunately by the time that memory hit me, she had passed away.  i have since been tracked and have seen them in there 'gray' state.  they love the dark because they just barely look different from black, but they do look different.  privately i have much more to say.    after i went back to work i told everyone, no one believed me.  i recounted this sighting for 3 days and nights.  finally i gave up and kept it to myself until way into my 30's and then i told a few close friends.  now years later i will tell anyone interested and esp. since your show has come on.  the whole thing was more of a sad feeling than terror because i felt like this was the end of my being with my family.  some people still don't believe me but now i don't care.  its proven and i'm not alone.  thank you for that.
content.summary: Hovered right above the trees and stared me down-elec off-time passed-it became invisiable

content.detailedDescription:
This occurred many years ago, when i was around 12 years old. i have never forgotten it all these years. i reported this to project blue book. i never heard anything back. 
i was sleeping outside in my back yard with a friend of mine. my friend was asleep and i was awake, watching the stars. the sky was crystal clear with no clouds. the object came from the south, and was huge. from one end of the delta wing to the other covered nearly the entire horizon from east to west. it had to have been at least a mile across, maybe more, and a half mile long. there was no mistaking what this was. i knew what the shape was because it blocked out the stars.  i've never seen anything like it since. the bottom of the object was covered with symmetrical small, white lights. it made no sound at all, and was traveling at a very high rate of speed in a straight line from south to north. it took only a few seconds to travel from the southern horizon to the northern horizon.  
i couldn't believe my eyes. i tried to wake my friend, but by the time i woke him, it was gone.
content.summary: A very large, delta wing shaped object, with symmetrical pattern of white lights on the bottom surface.
